forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain showers likely. Cloudy. High near 49, with temperatures falling to around 47 in the afternoon. South wind around 9 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain showers. Cloudy. Low around 42, with temperatures rising to around 47 overnight. Southeast wind 8 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 26 mph. Chance of precipitation is 100%. New rainfall amounts between a half and three quarters of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Wednesday
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain showers. Mostly cloudy. High near 58, with temperatures falling to around 52 in the afternoon. South wind 10 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 33 mph. Chance of precipitation is 100%. New rainfall amounts between a half and three quarters of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Wednesday Night
forecast.snowAmount: New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible

North wind 10 to 20 mph, with gusts as high as 35 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%. New snow accumulation of less than one inch possible.

sections.header: Stony Creek Cross Country Ski Rental:
sections.content: Cross Country Ski center closed for the season.

Bucks Run 2.5 km ski trail will be groomed for classic and skate ski today, March 2, 2025. There is an additional $5 daily trail fee for the use of Bucks Run or annual permits are available for $125. Dogs and walkers are not permitted on our groomed trails.

sections.header: Natural Snow Classic and Skate Ski Trails
sections.content: –  Due to the warm, rainy weather, trails have deteriorated and are not suitable for skiing.

Huron Meadows Metropark (Brighton).conditions: Some of the best skating of the season.  Hard skate deck, freshly groomed, fast but plenty of control.  Single classic track from building and into woods.  The last loop is not tracked, but there is a cutoff straight to the small hill that is tracked.  Lots of leaves with wind, especially in the tracks on the connector.Thanks HM for keeping us going this season.

Nubs Nob (Harbor Springs).conditions: Red and Blue loops are hard packed and fast with a light skiff of new . There is some wind debris: but no more than minor agility training . LF 7

nubsNob.liftsOpen: 5  lifts, the Space Worm, and the Rope Tow
nubsNob.xcTrails: Trails were groomed and tracked on Saturday. Conditions are very good.
nubsNob.nightSkiing: Tuesday through Saturday from 5:30 to 9:00 PM.
nubsNob.comments: The sun is out, the wind is light and the temperature is comfortable for skiing. The coverage on slopes continues to be very good with excellent grooming from our dedicated Crew. The XC trails and snowshoe trails still have plenty of natural snow. Pintail Peak Lodge is open with a deli and an espresso bar. The lifts will spin from 9 AM to 4:30 PM today. Make it a great day at Nub's Nob.
